body: LEAD: Serphin R. Maltese, a leader of the New York State Conservative Party for 17 years, has stepped down as state chairman and has been succeeded by his second-in-command, Michael R. Long, the Brooklyn Conservative leader and a former City Councilman. Serphin R. Maltese, a leader of the New York State Conservative Party for 17 years, has stepped
title: Maltese Resigns As Party Chief To Enter Senate

body: LEAD: To the Editor: To the Editor: As William F. Walbesser wrote (''Trumpeter Carried Custer's Last Message,'' letter, Nov. 8), Giovanni Martini - Custer's trumpeter, who delivered his commander's last message before the massacre of the Seventh Cavalry at the Battle of the Little Big Horn - is buried in the Cypress Hills National Cemetery in
title: Where to Find the Grave of Custer's Trumpeter

body: LEAD: To the Editor: To the Editor: In your Oct. 30 account of a dispute between Brooklyn community leaders and the Federal Government over the historical value of a lodge building on the grounds of the Cypress Hills National Cemetery, you refer to one of the many veterans buried there as ''the old Indian scout Black Jack Crawford, who delivered
title: Trumpeter Carried Custer's Last Message

body: LEAD: Of the 18 cemeteries in the Cypress Hills section of Brooklyn, none is more prominent than the Cypress Hills National Cemetery, one of 12 burial sites established for Civil War dead by President Abraham Lincoln and the only national cemetery in the city. Of the 18 cemeteries in the Cypress Hills section of Brooklyn, none is more prominent
title: A Civil War Cemetery Is Now a Battleground

body: LEAD: Apart from the official Memorial Day ceremonies, Geneva Belgrave visited the grave of a relative at the Cypress Hills National Cemetery in Brooklyn while a group of veterans took part in a gathering at the Vietnam Veterans Memorial at 55 Water Street. body: LEAD: The Koch administration yesterday named the first six areas of New York City in which water meters will be installed in residences under a two-year-old water conservation plan. The Koch administration yesterday named the first six areas of New York City in which water meters will be installed in residences under a two-year-old water
title: 6 Areas to Get Water Meters

body: LEAD: A woman was shot and killed, and her sister was seriously wounded, when the dead woman's ex-boyfriend approached them on a crowded platform at the Grand Central subway station in the rush hour last night and fired a shotgun before disappearing into the crowd, the police said. A woman was shot and killed, and her sister was seriously wounded,
title: Woman Killed By Gunman In IRT Station
